intro: Someone who enjoys privacy, tech, and software. Previously known as t3mm13n37, I lost my old users.json file to a faulty usb stick.

post.body: I honestly find the automatic "Hello ZeroMe!" message really annoying and, frankly useless. It just uses up unnecessary space, and spams the 'Everyone' dash whenever a bunch of people join near the same time.

I created a quick website I called GitZero which is a quick and dirty copy of ZeroWiki setup to be used for code.
Check it out here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DiruqWp7K4NijW6L6Ng87uWS5FsNsmsbL/

comment.body: You could always create a wiki style site customized for code if you just want something quick and dirty.
@Anonymous6354: You just go onto mail and in the to box type in their username.
